channel.title: Books College on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: amazon
item.description: I was glancing at my order history on amazon.com and I noticed that I have ordered a lot of stuff. I shoudl relaly save my money I suppose. here is a breakdown. a lot of these orders may have been one book. or may have been many books. 2 orders in 1997 5 orders in 1998 5 orders in 1999 14 orders in 2000 16 orders in 2001 32 orders in 2002 38 orders in 2003 4 orders in 2004 So yea.
